text: Pen kɨdek amɨl adɨkɨd apɨl, bɨne okok kɨlop agak, Nɨbop kɨles ma gek kɨn mɨdebɨm akaŋ agak? Tɨkjakem amnun agak. Mɨñɨl tep agak. Won anɨb ak Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop chen mɨmug gɨ dad amnɨgeb agak. Bɨ yɨp mɨmug nɨgup ak, bɨ tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok yɨp ñɨn adek kɨli ak ñɨnɨg, kɨlop poŋɨd apeb awl agak.
